content: मंदिरं [मंद्यतेऽत्र मंद् किरच्] {@--1@} A dwelling house, habitation, place, mansion; <ls>Ku. 7. 55</ls>; <ls>Bk. 8. 96</ls>; <ls>R. 12. 83.</ls> {@--2@} An abode, a dwelling in general; as in क्षरीब्धिमंदिरः. {@--3@} A town. {@--4@} A camp. {@--5@} A temple. --रः {@--1@} The sea. {@--2@} The hollow of the knee, ham.
